author: Special Correspondent
text: Soon after the Opposition got an amendment to the President’s Address passed in the Rajya Sabha, regretting omission of the remarks highlighting laws that prevent under-educated candidates from contesting local elections in Haryana and Rajasthan, Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi on Wednesday accused the BJP government of snatching away the rights of the poor.
title: Rahul attacks BJP for denying the poor their right
